nodes.text: A groundcar was a wheeled vehicle. The TIE fighter pilot Amara Kel compared the shriek of a TIE fighter's engines to a cross between an angry beast and a groundcar skidding on wet asphalt.

The groundcar was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2020 short story "Amara Kel's Rules for TIE Pilot Survival (Probably)" from the collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back, authored by Django Wexler. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the groundcar first appeared in the 1995 short story Hammertong: The Tale of the "Tonnika Sisters" from the collection Tales from the Mos Eisley Cantina, authored by Timothy Zahn.
